channel.title: üè¢ Hong Kong University of Science and Technology on AI Paper Reviews by AI
channel.description: Recent content in üè¢ Hong Kong University of Science and Technology on AI Paper Reviews by AI

item.title: OmniCreator: Self-Supervised Unified Generation with Universal Editing
item.description: OmniCreator: Self-supervised unified image+video generation & universal editing.

item.title: VideoGen-of-Thought: A Collaborative Framework for Multi-Shot Video Generation
item.description: VideoGen-of-Thought (VGoT) creates high-quality, multi-shot videos by collaboratively generating scripts, keyframes, and video clips, ensuring narrative consistency and visual coherence.

item.title: MagicDriveDiT: High-Resolution Long Video Generation for Autonomous Driving with Adaptive Control
item.description: MagicDriveDiT generates high-resolution, long street-view videos with precise control, exceeding limitations of previous methods in autonomous driving.

item.title: Golden Touchstone: A Comprehensive Bilingual Benchmark for Evaluating Financial Large Language Models
item.description: Golden Touchstone, a new bilingual benchmark, comprehensively evaluates financial LLMs across eight tasks, revealing model strengths and weaknesses and advancing FinLLM research.
